com.isotrol.impe3.core
Interface Pages

All Known Implementing Classes:
PagesImpl
public interface Pages

Interface for the collection of pages in a portal.

Author:
Andres Rodriguez

Method Summary

          Returns CIP by id.

Method Detail

getPage

Page getPage(UUID id)
Returns a page by id.

Parameters:
id - Page Id.
Returns:
The requested page or null if it is not found.

getCIP

CIP getCIP(UUID cipId)
Returns CIP by id.

Parameters:
cipId - CIP Id.
Returns:
The requested CIP or null if it is not found.

getPage

Page getPage(Route route)
Returns a page by route.

Parameters:
route - Page route.
Returns:
The requested page or null if it no suitable page is found.

getPage

PageContext getPage(PortalModel model,
                    PortalRequestContext context,
                    PathSegments path,
                    LocalParams params,
                    PageKey previous)
Returns a page context by path.

Parameters:
model - Current portal model.
context - Current portal request context.
path - Path to resolve.
params - Initial local parameters.
previous - Externally resolved page key.
Returns:
The requested page or null if it no suitable page is found.
